definition: Loki, god of fire and mischievous destroyer in Norse mythology
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
Rocky Mountains/also written 洛磯山|洛矶山

sentences.english: Wolves have recovered in the Northern Rockies," he said.
sentences.chinese: 北洛基山的灰狼已经恢复过来了。

sentences.english: Vicky cycled alone through the Rocky Mountains down to the western United States.
sentences.chinese: 姬莹一人骑车穿过洛基山脉抵达美国西部。

sentences.english: Are you having an affair with Brooke Windham?
sentences.chinese: 你和布洛基云汉夫人有婚外恋吗？

sentences.english: The setting was Douglas' home in the Rocky Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫场景就设在道格拉斯在洛基山的家中。

sentences.english: My family is going to the Rocky English Training Camp together this summer.
sentences.chinese: 今年夏天我们全家一起去洛基英语集训营。

sentences.english: The producers at United Artists finally gave in and allowed Stallone to play Rocky.
sentences.chinese: 最后是联美的制片商屈服了，同意让他演洛基。

sentences.english: Across the northern Rocky mountains, bighorn sheep are dying in their hundreds from pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 在北洛基山脉以外，数以百计的大角羊死于肺炎。

sentences.english: We have seen that only Loki the trickster manages to escape the fee.
sentences.chinese: 我们看到了只有洛基这骗子有本事逃脱代价。

sentences.english: Loki provides an intriguing setting for this pursuit.
sentences.chinese: 洛基为这种追求提供了一个耐人寻味的设置。

sentences.english: It'll be an exciting experience to climb the Rockies at this time of year.
sentences.chinese: 在这种季节去爬洛基山，那一定是件令人兴奋的事。

sentences.english: Two events conspire to precipitate our departure from Loki.
sentences.chinese: 两件事情凑到沉淀洛基我们离开。

sentences.english: There were 13 gods sitting around the table, including Loki.
sentences.chinese: 包括洛基在内，宴会桌周围坐着13个神。

sentences.english: In Norse mythology, earthquakes were explained as the violent struggling of the god Loki.
sentences.chinese: 在挪威的神话中，地震被解释为洛基神的猛烈的斗争。

sentences.english: The most famous monsters in Norse are the three children of Loki.
sentences.chinese: 在挪威最有名的怪物是洛基的三个孩子。

sentences.english: Wolves have recovered in the Northern Rockies, " he said."
sentences.chinese: 北洛基山的灰狼已经恢复过来了。

sentences.english: I have been, but this concerns Thor and Loki.
sentences.chinese: 我已经在处理了，但是这件事涉及到索尔和洛基。

definition: Titan (race of deities in Greek mythology, moon of Saturn etc)
Poseidon, God of the sea in Greek mythology
